titleNullable: Twitter Cryptocurrency and NFT accounts 2022 short
subtitleNullable: sorted by number of followers, SMP Score and Total Grade
descriptionNullable:
Twitter Cryptocurrency and NFT accounts 2022. Data based on short list of 800 Twitter accounts related to Cryptocurrencies and NFTs.
Purchase of the full dataset with 3292 units is [available on the website Data40.com](https://data40.com/downloads/twitter-cryptocurrency-and-nft-accounts-q1-2022/)

The research contains information about NFT Influencers on Twitter based on analyzed tweets, mentions, hashtags and news in the NFT world.

### More data sets and reports

We specialize in collecting the raw data, structuring it and making reports. Our main four focuses are: gaming / gamedev; gambling / betting; venture / investments; blockchain / cryptocurrencies. You can find more reports or request a new one on our site - [data40.com](https://data40.com)
